text: Ðys synd þaXIIacera londe gemæra æt ulenbeorge þe Beortulf cyng gefreoda & gebocoda into Eveshomme.
<../images/tbar.gif>is ærest of ulan wyllan on osland mære.
Of osland mære onlong mores on ða brodan stret.
Of þam garan on ða mær aac on stanbeorge.
Of þam beorge on ðone ealde weg.
Of þam broce on buntinge dic.
Swa æft on feala mæres broc.
Ðwyres ofer ðene ridig on fif acan.
Þanon in ðene broc andlang streames.
Of þam streame on ryschealas middewearde on þene blacan broc.
Onlong broces midstreame on þa lytle riðig.
Of þam riðige æft on ulan wylle.
